How to pair AirPods with an iPhone?.chunk_text: Pair AirPods with iPhone or iPad
Pair AirPods with an Apple device
Open the case with your AirPods inside, then hold it next to the device that you want to pair until the setup animation appears.
When your AirPods appear in the list of Bluetooth devices, select them.
In the list of devices, select your AirPods, then click Connect.
Tap Bluetooth, then tap your AirPods on the Bluetooth screen to connect.
pair AirPods with your device manually

How to reset AirPods?.chunk_text: If your AirPods aren’t working correctly after you restart or unpair them, you can try resetting them to their factory settings.
Put the AirPods in their case, close the lid, then wait 30 seconds. Open the lid, then press and hold the
When you successfully reset your AirPods, the status light flashes amber, then white.
Put the AirPods in their case, close the lid, then wait 30 seconds. Open the lid, then double-tap the front of the case three times.
Restart, unpair, or reset your AirPods
If you hold the buttons longer than around 10 seconds, AirPods Max are reset to factory settings.
Put the AirPods in their case, then close the lid for a minimum of 10 seconds.
If your AirPods aren’t working right, try restarting them.

then click the name of your AirPods in the sidebar. (You may need to scroll down.)

click devices, select your AirPods, click
, sign in to your Apple Account, select All Devices, then select your AirPods.
tap the name of your AirPods

How to use AirPods with a Mac?.chunk_text: Open the case with your AirPods inside, hold it next to your Mac, then press and hold the
Open the case with your AirPods inside, hold it next to your Mac, then double-tap the front of the AirPods case so the status light flashes white.
Pair AirPods with an Apple device
In the list of devices, select your AirPods, then click Connect.
When your AirPods appear in the list of Bluetooth devices, select them.
In some situations, you receive a notification about your AirPods on the screen of your Mac. Click the Connect button to confirm that you want your AirPods to switch to—or stay with—your Mac.
then click the name of your AirPods in the sidebar. Below Connect to This Mac, choose When Last Connected to This Mac.
